capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: The role requires the ability to express views, accept, and commit to change in a regulatory environment, ensuring public safety and compliance.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: High ethical standards and professionalism are crucial in dealing with sensitive regulatory compliance and enforcement activities.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Self-motivation and a proactive approach are essential for leading in a dynamic and technical field.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respect for diverse backgrounds is important in a collaborative and inclusive team environment.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Effective communication skills are required for engaging with a range of stakeholders and promoting regulatory compliance.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with industry stakeholders, regulatory bodies, and internal teams is key to achieving safety and compliance outcomes.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Ability to influence and negotiate with industry stakeholders to ensure compliance and safety is critical.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving safety and compliance outcomes through effective regulatory frameworks and enforcement activities.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Strategic planning and prioritization are necessary for developing and implementing regulatory frameworks.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Critical thinking and problem-solving are required for addressing safety and technical challenges in the gas and pipeline sector.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: The role demands accountability in regulatory compliance, enforcement activities, and risk management.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Effective planning, coordination, and control methods are needed for leading technical research programs and developing industry guidelines.

skills.name: Regulatory Compliance
skills.description: Ensuring adherence to laws, regulations, guidelines, and specifications relevant to gas networks and pipelines.

skills.name: Technical Expertise in Gas Networks
skills.description: In-depth knowledge of gas network and pipeline construction, operation, maintenance, and safety.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Building and maintaining relationships with internal and external stakeholders to promote regulatory compliance and safety.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.description: Identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks to public safety and infrastructure integrity.

generalRole.title: Principal Inspector in Energy Regulation
generalRole.description: This role involves leading safety, technical regulation, and licensing functions for pipelines and gas networks, ensuring public safety and compliance with regulatory frameworks. It requires a blend of technical expertise, stakeholder engagement, and strategic planning.
